name: Dawn Pecci
text: I haven't had Hungry Howie's in awhile and upon looking at thier menu last night (Tuesday, 11/5/19) on line, they were offering the 3 Cheezy Bread for only $2.00 instead of $5.99! So, I placed and order for those and thier XL Pepperoni ‚Ä¶More

name: A Fer
text: This place has to have the worst customer service. I placed order online to have delivered to my son for lunch by 12 (that is his lunch break) 12 came no delivery. Have called many times no answer and then finally someone picks up and then ‚Ä¶More

text: Ordered the pizza well done. Arrived still not cooked, very doughy.  Why put ‚Äúwell done‚Äù as an option on the app if it‚Äôs never cooked well done?  0/10 recommend this to anyone.

text: The pizza is amazing. If you aren't in the mood for pizza, they have salad, wings, pasta and subs. The staff makes it how you like it!! Also, the staffs are really friendly!!  I highly recommend this place üíôüòç

text: Ordered a pizza and wings tonight. While I will say that the wings are better than most chain‚Äôs wings, the pizza was just average. I ordered the pizza well done and it was still super doughey and lame. Barely any crisp to the crust. I can‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

text: This location has been under the name cornerstone pizzas and more since nov. However january 13th was our last day open. No wonder no deliveries have went out....

text: Love wings and bread

name: Amanda Garcia
text: Took forever for delivery. Dry crust with no topper. No dipping cups I ordered. Sent a packet of ranch dressing. Called manager who was rude and was like what do you want me to do about it. The things online are different feom our store. ‚Ä¶More

name: Twitch
text:
I spoke with Billy, ordered 2 large pizzas. one with pepperoni and another with half bacon half banana pepper (not for me yo). They came and the half/half pizza came slightly different then expected, dude was cool when i called back too sent me a whole new one correct!
10/10 eat here

name: David Lunder
text: As a former New Yorker, I was real skeptical about chain pizzerias, but I've got to say, I became addicted to their Cajun crust pizza!  I want to try the other flavored crusts, but haven't done so yet because I love the Cajun flavor so much! The restaurant is very clean and staff is friendly. The  prices are great.

name: Kimberly Heifetz
text: Very clean and reasonably priced. Food was excellent too. Now Cornerstone Pizza and more. Same prices and menu options.

name: Amy Castro
text: Pizza and the scene at this spot is very good. You will not be disappointed in the menu and service. I will be back with my relatives. Feels like a place in Los Angeles I liked.

name: Offdachain FloridaBoy561
text: Best pizza on the planet earth would not be the same without its way better than any pizza on the planet

name: Isabelle Stone
text: It was good while it lasted until the owner ran it into the ground

name: Savannah Gilbert
text:
As a customer: really great good lots of choices great prices and they always fix any problem you have
As an employee: great work environment friendly staff billy is always there to ‚Ä¶More

name: Always Glackin
text: Food was good, I honestly expected my pizza to never show up since it said it would take 60 minutes and I placed the order at 10:31 and they close at 11. Order showed up about half an hour early, my only regret is being broke and only being able to tip three dollars and ninety three cents that nice lady deserved more.

name: Jenandez TV
text: We have been enjoying this location ever since the new owners have taken over! They are kind and upbeat. The pizza is crazy good, a family favorite!

name: Hilde Stickley
text: The pepperoni pizza is awesome.  By far the best in town.  Please bring a pizza a day to my home doorstep and just drop them off.  I could live on your food!!

name: Marlene Santana
text: First time visiting Hungry Howie's and I liked it, stuffed crust black olives and grilled chicken pizza was awesome.  Place looked clean but the girl whom attended us was by herself üòü for a bit (felt sorry for her) but she got our order right üëçüëç. Pizza was steaming hot....

name: Teresa Davis
text: My family always orders from this Hungry Howies location and have never been disappointed. Pizza isn‚Äôt even a favorite food of mine but tonight was so delicious that I had to write a review!! Their stuffed crust was nothing short of amazing! Delivery time was less than what my online order predicted. Great job Hungry Howies!!

name: Tara Conover
text: First time eating here! I ordered delivery because I'm new around here! It was so great a lot of food for the money! Fast delivery! Nice and hot!

name: Merle & Sharon Heeter
text: Food was great.  Delivery person forgot salad and never went back and checked on it.  Her name is Michelle and after a $10.00 tip, someone else had to deliver it.  Sure hope someone in management makes her share her tip!!!

text: Great pizza better service

name: Eric Quick
text: Terrible food and the last time I was there they had a girl who was a child manager who had no clue. I heard she got fired so if they could completely replace all of the food then it might be ok now.

text: I called tonight. 1/25/2017...and the girl that answered...she called me sweetheart and was just the nicest person to deal with. I wish I could have got her name because she deserves a raise...it's hard to find good customer service anymore and she had a awesome attitude!
